testcase.name: Find a product with search bar
testcase.system-out: Given User is on homepage...................................................passed Given User is on search bar.................................................passed When User enter a "fe" in search bar........................................passed And User press on search button.............................................passed Then User should see some results under the searchbar with the word "fe"....passed
